id.comment: Set 1 - Test syntax of ModifiesP. ModifiesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; variable v; Select v such that Modifies(pr, v)

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: constant c; variable v; Select c such that Modifies(c, v)

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; prog_line n; Select pr such that Modifies(pr, n)

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS invalid synonym

query.querystr: variable v; while w; Select v such that Modifies(v, w)

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Modifies(pr, _)

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS wildcard RHS synonym

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(_, v)

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(_, _)

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS Ident

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Modifies(pr, "banana")

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Modifies(pr, "d4")

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS Ident RHS synonym

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Modifies("F", "fiction")

id.comment: ModifiesP syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Modifies("Mon", "D")
